All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Align
A Parent which aligns its single child within itself
Alignment
Represents the alignment of an object relative to another
Animation
Animation holds a value which increments from 0 to 1 over some duration.
Animation.RepeatMode
 
Animation.State
 
AnimationCurve
Animation curves transforms an animation's value from a (0 - 1) range to a point on a curve
Appearance
Appearance contains a BufferedImage and a Graphics2D object which draws to the image
Application
Application is the heart of a GameKit program.
Bounds
Represents a render bound on the screen in which a Widget is rendered
Camera
Singleton class which controls which part of the game world is rendered in the Window
Center
A Parent which centers its single child
Column
A Parent which arranges its children vertically
Constants
Holds constants accessible across the entire engine
Constraints
An immutable record for width and height range values for width and height
Image
A Widget which loads a resource image and renders it to the screen
Image.Fit
Determines how the image should be resized/fitted in its bounds
Input
Singleton class responsible for capturing keyboard and mouse inputs for use in the application.
IO
Static class responsible for resource loading and file output.
Math
Utility class providing commonly used math utility methods
MultiChildParent
A parent which contains multiple child Widgets
Padding
A Parent which adds padding around its single child
Parent
A parent is a Widget which can contain one or more children.
Prop
Represents game objects within Scenes.
Renderer
Static class which provides draw methods to draw on the window scene.
Row
A Parent which arranges its children horizontally
Scene
A scene is a collection of props interacting with each other to form a logic part of your application.
SingleChildParent
A parent which contains only one child Widget
Spacing
Represents a padding or margin of a Widget
Task
Interface for an arbitrary task
Text
A Widget which renders text to the screen
Timeout
Timeout executes a specified Task after its duration has elapsed.
Widget
A widget is an abstract representation of a portion of a Scene's user interface.
Window
Singleton class which manages the JFrame the application is rendered in
Window.Resolution
